column4: hello everyone. I have been reading some manpages and notices they refer to some commands as command(number), for instance less(1). Does anyone know what the number in the parentheises represents?
, thanks! Wonder how I missed the part about sections when I checked there last. So the numbers more or less describes what kind of category the program is in?
thats how I understand it, but its been a while since I worked much with the shell :)
